title: manavi cEkonavayya
sahitya:
manavi cEkonavayya inakula tilakA nI


anupallavi

  pannaga shayana nAdu paritApamulanu dIrccuDa


caraNam    kari moraviDa gAnE vacci kanikaramutO brOva lEdA 
tarapaDi hariyani pilacina draupadini brOvalEdA
cira jIvidyAdi sakala varamulosagu vADanucu 
caraNamulanu nera nammiti varada venkaTEshvara nI
